docs.snippet: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about today:
docs.lead_paragraph: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about today:

docs.snippet: Uruguay striker Luis Suarez's practice of biting opponents seems to be a safe bet.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay striker Luis Suarez's practice of biting opponents seems to be a safe bet.

headline.main: Norwegian Wins Bet on Suarez World Cup Bite
headline.print_headline: Norwegian Wins Bet on Suarez World Cup Bite

docs.snippet: Forgotten for a moment who won the 1990 World Cup?
docs.lead_paragraph: Forgotten for a moment who won the 1990 World Cup?

headline.main: Dancing Colombia Set Bar for Wild World Cup Celebrations
headline.print_headline: Dancing Colombia Set Bar for Wild World Cup Celebrations

docs.snippet: Luis Suarez's lawyer believes there is a European campaign against the controversial striker, who on Wednesday was preparing his defense after being accused of biting an Italy defender during Uruguay's 1-0 win at the World Cup.
docs.lead_paragraph: Luis Suarez's lawyer believes there is a European campaign against the controversial striker, who on Wednesday was preparing his defense after being accused of biting an Italy defender during Uruguay's 1-0 win at the World Cup.

headline.main: Suarez Victim of European Campaign, Lawyer Says
headline.print_headline: Suarez Victim of European Campaign, Lawyer Says

docs.snippet: Mario Balotelli has reacted to harsh criticism — some of it discriminatory — for Italy's group-stage exit from the World Cup, as the fallout turned into an ugly hunt for scapegoats on Wednesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mario Balotelli has reacted to harsh criticism — some of it discriminatory — for Italy's group-stage exit from the World Cup, as the fallout turned into an ugly hunt for scapegoats on Wednesday.

headline.main: Balotelli Hits Back at Criticism, Discrimination
headline.print_headline: Balotelli Hits Back at Criticism, Discrimination

docs.snippet: Uruguayan media have accused other countries of launching a 'manhunt' against striker Luis Suarez after he bit an opponent in the team's 1-0 victory over Italy at the World Cup on Tuesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguayan media have accused other countries of launching a 'manhunt' against striker Luis Suarez after he bit an opponent in the team's 1-0 victory over Italy at the World Cup on Tuesday.

docs.snippet: The wife of Alan Gross, a U.S. government development subcontractor serving a 15-year prison sentence in Cuba, said Wednesday she fears for his life even more after he received the demoralizing news of his mother's death from cancer.
docs.lead_paragraph: The wife of Alan Gross, a U.S. government development subcontractor serving a 15-year prison sentence in Cuba, said Wednesday she fears for his life even more after he received the demoralizing news of his mother's death from cancer.

headline.main: Wife of US Man Jailed in Cuba Says He's Despondent
headline.print_headline: Wife of US Man Jailed in Cuba Says He's Despondent

docs.snippet: As the world was judging Uruguay's Luis Suarez for biting a player in the World Cup, his teammates, coaches and fans in his soccer-crazy country defended the star, blaming the foreign media, his Italian opponents and uneven treatment.
docs.lead_paragraph: As the world was judging Uruguay's Luis Suarez for biting a player in the World Cup, his teammates, coaches and fans in his soccer-crazy country defended the star, blaming the foreign media, his Italian opponents and uneven treatment.

headline.main: Uruguay Defends Suarez as FIFA Scrambles
headline.print_headline: Uruguay Defends Suarez as FIFA Scrambles

docs.snippet: Luis Suarez, the striker at the centre of the biggest story of the World Cup, disappointed a healthy cohort of the world’s media by failing to show up at Uruguay training in Natal on Wednesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Luis Suarez, the striker at the centre of the biggest story of the World Cup, disappointed a healthy cohort of the world’s media by failing to show up at Uruguay training in Natal on Wednesday.

headline.main: Suarez No-Show but Controversy Dominates Uruguay Training
headline.print_headline: Suarez No-Show but Controversy Dominates Uruguay Training

docs.snippet: Former Inter Milan and Manchester City manager Roberto Mancini has emerged as the early favourite to be the next Italy coach after Cesare Prandelli resigned following the Azzurri’s World Cup exit on Tuesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Inter Milan and Manchester City manager Roberto Mancini has emerged as the early favourite to be the next Italy coach after Cesare Prandelli resigned following the Azzurri’s World Cup exit on Tuesday.

headline.main: Mancini Early Favourite to Be Next Italy Coach
headline.print_headline: Mancini Early Favourite to Be Next Italy Coach
